title: Labour calls for Plan B Covid measures in England
content: But the chancellor says the data does not suggest "immediately" moving to government's back-up plan.

title: Budget about investing in public services - Sunak
content: The chancellor says he will set out a plan for rebuilding the economy next week based on skills.
en_title: Budget about investing in public services - Sunak
en_content: The chancellor says he will set out a plan for rebuilding the economy next week based on skills.

title: Chancellor to pledge funds for skills training
content: The government sets out its package for new T-levels and boosting further education in England.
en_title: Chancellor to pledge funds for skills training
en_content: The government sets out its package for new T-levels and boosting further education in England.

title: UK says new NI Protocol talks 'constructive'
content: A government source says the EU has offered "things that we can work with" but gaps remain.

en_content: A government source says the EU has offered "things that we can work with" but gaps remain.

title: Ministers pledge Â£500m to support young families
content: A network of "family hubs" is to be funded in England to provide support services in one place.

en_content: A network of "family hubs" is to be funded in England to provide support services in one place.

title: Online safety plans need more clarity, says Twitter
content: The government says it will tackle extreme posts but Twitter warns Ofcom will be "muddling through".

en_content: The government says it will tackle extreme posts but Twitter warns Ofcom will be "muddling through".

content: The chancellor will announce increased funding for tram, train and bus services in England.
